main event: A Foreign Service Officer and a Marine Security Guard observed a bright object in the sky while traveling from Kabul to Kalat, Afghanistan, on June 11, 1966.
interesting points: The object was initially seen as a bright star low on the horizon and moved both horizontally and vertically,The object was estimated to be four to five times brighter than the North Star and appeared blue in color,The object remained visible for about 1 hour and 45 minutes before disappearing,Before it disappeared, the object shone brighter than surrounding stars and performed various maneuvers,The sighting concluded as the sun began to rise, dimming the object's visibility.
sighted object: a bright unidentified object in the sky
witness description: A Foreign Service Officer and a Marine Security Guard from the American Embassy in Kabul
